CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Safe Bulkers, Inc Common Stock ($0.001 par value)

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6, AVENUE DES CITRONNIERS,APT. D11, LES ACANTHES, MONACO CITY, MC98000, Monaco

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Safe Bulkers Inc operates as a holding company. The company, through its subsidiaries, provides marine dry bulk transportation services. Its other business activities include transporting bulk cargoes, particularly coal, grain, and iron ore. The company's operational fleet comprised of Panamax, Kamsarmax, Post-Panamax and Capesize class vessels among others.
